summary: anon here’s the next one and oh my god, I really love it so thank you. “I don’t do hugs,” blurb - FLUFF!! - words 780 --- Nick...
body:
anon here’s the next one and oh my god, I really love it so thank you.

“I don’t do hugs,”

blurb - FLUFF!! - words 780

—

Nick laughed joyously from across the table and so did all your other friends but all you did was sink further back into the cold steel seat of the posh and very expensive restaurant you had been dragged to kicking and screaming.

You felt home sick.

London was very big and so different to what you were used to and tonight you had planned to curl up in bed and watch some movies while you fought through the anxiety of being in your new home but Nick thought different. Your new best friend demanding you to come out and truly experience the city and to not let the one month you had been here to deter you from how beautiful it truly is.

Even though Nick had dragged you out for a ‘fun’ night you felt a little left out and you were regretting letting him drag you here. Your bed was screaming for you to come back but you were just a bit stuck with your new friends and didn’t know how to get out of it.

Harry was the only one out of the group of ten that seemed to notice your feelings. To him, even though he was perched right beside you, he would be able to feel your negative vibes even if he was across the room.

“Are you alright YN?” He asked, arm slinging over the back of your chair, angling himself towards you.

You had become the closest to Harry out of everyone, which he did not know and surprised you a bit considering you talked to Nick every day. Harry had something about him though. The first time you met him you felt very similar to how you felt now and he came out and talked to you which calmed you down right away and because of that you felt you could tell him anything which you couldn’t do with Nick.

“Yeah,” you whispered half heartedly giving him a soft smile.

Harry pursed his lips at you and you felt the light brush of fingers against your shoulder. That was another reason why you felt a bit closer to Harry. The simple brush of his fingers over your shoulder stirred all the feelings you had for him deep in your belly.

“Think you’re lying love,” He spoke softly, making it so the conversation just stayed between the two of you. “What’s wrong?”

You shook your head at him. There wasn’t really anything wrong, you just didn’t feel right and that wasn’t anything to worry him about in your mind. Harry also called you ‘love’ and this time your stomach did an entire flip.

“What’s wrong?”

Again, you shook your head at him and you felt your eyes water a little. You swear you were fine but sometimes that question just got you a little teary. Harry quickly surprised you though by leaning over and closing the last little bit of distance between the two of you. His long arms wrapped around your shoulders and he tugged you against his chest in a warm embracing hug.

“I don’t do hugs, Harry.” You pursed your lips at him. It was a lie, a big fat lie. If Harry could hold you like this forever, you would never complain.

“At least smile for me first,” He said, a smile on his lips as he rested his chin on your shoulder.

His green eyes were so close and you felt yourself drowning in the beautiful colour. You couldn’t smile because you were too lost in the beauty of him being so close to you.

Harry squeezed your shoulders. “Just a little smile for me. So pretty when you smile.”

The muscles in your cheeks twitched up and with your small smile Harry’s grew and the happiness sparked in his already gorgeous eyes. Your eyes still felt a little watery but Harry just wanting and trying so hard to make you smile was what encouraged it to break your sombre mood.

“So pretty,” He breathed out gently before pressing a soft kiss against your cheek.

The heat rapidly rose to your cheeks with the chaste press of kiss to your skin. It was small and barely there but your heart was beating so strongly you swore that it was going to beat right out of your chest and onto the restaurant table.

“You’re such an idiot.” You chuckled airily.

“You love me.” With a final squeeze of your shoulders he drew back to his own seat but he kept his arm slung over the back of your chair, fingers still ghosting against your shoulder blade.

You hummed lightly, the smile still on your face. Maybe you did.

title: Smoke & Mirrors
body:
Smoke and Mirrors: a metaphor for a deceptive, fraudulent or insubstantial explanation or description.

10

It was the last night of tour and everybody seemed to be buzzin’. Harry felt like he’d been pumped full of drugs or something because he felt like he was floating. But he knew the real thing that…

summary: When you're a lesbian but would instantly marry so many celebrity men if you were actually attracted to them lmao

Brendon Urie

Like??? In another life these dudes could’ve been my husbands.

summary: The Flight That Changed My Life
title: The Flight That Changed My Life
body:
Jenni Williams needs inspiration, to find out what she wants to do with her life. Will an accidental run-in with newly formed pop band One Direction be just the push she needs to follow her dreams?

Chapter 9: Over the Pond

Harry’s POV:I’m stuck across the aisle from Louis, Jenn and Niall and I’m losing my mind. Ever since she nearly knocked me over in the airport I have been obsessed. But does she get seated next to me…

Read more…

summary: In The Heat of Los Angeles
title: In The Heat of Los Angeles
body:
This city’s killing me. I want, I want, I want everything. This city’s killing me, In the heat of Los Angeles.

And in the end…

And in the end, the love you take is equal to the love you make.So I’ve had quite a summer. More emotions and changes than I could’ve predicted.And let me tell you, they are a rollercoaster for me…

Read more…

summary: "Why is he always so cool and beautiful, I can't even take ugly pictures and laughing at him." - Louis Tomlinson, grumpy...
body:
Louis wanted to take a picture of Harry.

“Why is he always so cool and beautiful, I can’t even take ugly pictures and laughing at him.” - Louis Tomlinson, grumpy boyfriend
